meanings.definition: Full of or characterized by lighthearted fun or mischief
meanings.sent1: The children had the larkiest time playing in the park.
meanings.sent2: She had the larkiest smile on her face during the game.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's larkiest antics always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His larkiest personality shone through even in serious situations.
meanings.sent5: The larkiest music filled the room, lifting everyone's spirits.
